name: Disintegration
summary: Disintegration is a sci-fi FPS combined with RTS elements. Pilot a heavily weaponized Gravcycle while commanding your troops on the ground as you battle through a thrilling single-player campaign and in frenetic PvP multiplayer.
info:
• 发行: Private Division
  • 别名: 瓦解
  • 平台: PC
  • 平台: Xbox One
  • 平台: PS4
  • 游戏类型: FPS
  • 游玩人数: 单人，多人
  • 发行日期: 2020年6月16日
  • 官方网站: https://www.disintegrationgame.com/
  • 开发: V1 Interactive
